board.closed_info: This board is closed. Reopen the board to make changes.
board.denied: You do not have permission to change
board.list_delete_warn: List deletion is permanent. All cards and actions will be deleted. You won't be able to restore it.
board.only_admin: Board must have at least one admin
board.private_descr: Only board members and workspace admins can see this board
board.public_descr: Anyone can see this board. Only board members can edit
board.remove_warn: Board deletion is permanent. All cards and actions will be deleted. You won't be able to restore it.
board.settings_archive_task: Any board member can archive cards
board.settings_close_task: Any board member can change the execution status of the card
board.settings_create_task: Any board member can add and edit cards
board.settings_delete_task: Any board member can delete cards
board.settings_lists: Any board member can add and edit lists
board.settings_member: Any board member can add new member
board.settings_task_members: Any board member can add and remove card members
board.settings_task_order: Any board member can move cards
board.settings_update: Any board member can change information about the board (name, description and background)
